title: Creamy Garlic Tuscan Salmon
description: Delicious salmon fillets smothered in a creamy garlic sauce with sun-dried tomatoes and spinach
instructions: Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Sear salmon fillets for 4-5 minutes per side until golden brown
Remove salmon and set aside
In the same skillet, add garlic and cook for 1 minute
Add heavy cream, sun-dried tomatoes, and spinach
Cook until spinach wilts and sauce thickens
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted
Return salmon to the skillet and simmer for 2-3 minutes
Garnish with fresh basil and serve

title: Authentic Thai Green Curry
description: A fragrant and spicy Thai curry with coconut milk, vegetables, and your choice of protein
instructions: 2 tablespoons (28g) oil
All of the green curry paste
5 cloves garlic, finely chopped
3/4 cup (177ml) chicken stock
13.5oz (400ml) full fat coconut milk
2 tablespoons (30ml) fish sauce
1 tablespoon (17g) palm sugar
3/4 lb. (340g) chicken thigh
1.5 cups (160g) snow peas
1/2 bunch Thai basil leaves
2 Thai eggplants
juice of 1 lime
steamed rice, for serving
fried shallots, for garnish
Thai basil, for garnish
3 Serrano chilies, thinly sliced, for garnish
lime wedges, for serving

title: Classic Tiramisu
description: The perfect Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream
instructions: Beat egg yolks and sugar until pale and thick
Add mascarpone cheese and mix until smooth
Whip heavy cream to soft peaks and fold into mascarpone mixture
Mix coffee and coffee liqueur in a shallow dish
Quickly dip each ladyfinger in coffee mixture
Arrange dipped ladyfingers in a single layer in a 9x13 dish
Spread half the mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers
Repeat with another layer of dipped ladyfingers
Spread remaining mascarpone mixture on top
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight
Dust with cocoa powder and garnish with chocolate shavings before serving

title: Spicy Chicken Pasta
description: Creamy pasta with tender chicken in a spicy tomato sauce
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions
Season chicken with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until golden brown, about 6-8 minutes
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute
Stir in crushed tomatoes, red pepper flakes, and simmer for 5 minutes
Add heavy cream and Parmesan cheese, stir until melted
Drain pasta and toss with sauce
Garnish with fresh basil and serve

title: Crispy Chicken Burger
description: Juicy chicken patty with crispy coating in a soft bun
instructions: Mix ground chicken, egg, breadcrumbs, and seasonings
Form into 4 patties and chill for 10 minutes
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Fry patties for 6-7 minutes per side until golden and cooked through
Toast burger buns
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise
Serve immediately

title: Vegetable Biryani
description: Fragrant rice dish with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, beans, cauliflower)
instructions: Soak rice for 30 minutes and cook until 70% done
Heat oil and fry onions until golden
Add tomatoes, vegetables, and biryani masala
Cook vegetables until tender
Layer rice and vegetable mixture in a pot
Add water, yogurt, and fried onions
Cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until rice is fully cooked
Garnish with cilantro and mint
Serve hot with raita

title: Chinese Wok Noodles
description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables in savory sauce
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, carrots, cabbage)
instructions: Cook noodles according to package directions
Heat vegetable oil in a wok over high heat
Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Add cooked noodles to the wok
Pour in soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil
Toss everything together for 2 minutes
Season with salt and pepper
Garnish with green onions and serve hot

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake with molten center
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
Melt butter and chocolate together
Whisk eggs, egg yolks, and sugar until pale
Fold in melted chocolate mixture
Sift in flour and salt, fold gently
Pour batter into greased ramekins
Bake for 12 minutes until edges are set but center is soft
Let cool for 1 minute, then invert onto plates
Dust with powdered sugar and serve with ice cream

title: Butter Chicken
description: Rich and creamy Indian curry with tender chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the masala for 1 hour
Heat butter in a large pan
Cook onions, garlic, and ginger until golden
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned
Stir in tomato puree and remaining masala
Simmer for 20 minutes until chicken is tender
Add cream and simmer for 5 more minutes
Garnish with cilantro and serve with naan or rice

title: Avocado Toast
description: Simple and healthy breakfast with creamy avocado on toasted bread
instructions: Cut the avocado by inserting a knife until it hits the seed, then work the knife around the avocado and open it with a twist
Remove the seed by jabbing a knife into it and twisting
Scoop out the avocado flesh with a spoon
Mash the avocado with a fork, leaving it a little chunky for texture
Toast your bread until it's crispy and evenly browned
Spread the mashed avocado onto the toast using a fork, ensuring edge-to-edge coverage and a good avocado-to-bread ratio
Squeeze a small amount of lemon juice over the avocado toast
Add a pinch of salt and pepper
Finish with a pinch of red chili pepper flakes for heat
Optionally, cut the avocado toast in half before serving

title: Eggs Benedict
description: Classic breakfast with poached eggs and hollandaise sauce
ingredients: 1/8 of a teaspoon of cayenne pepper
1/8 of a teaspoon of black pepper
instructions: Melt 1/4 cup of butter over medium heat.
Separate four eggs, using the yolks for the Hollandaise sauce.
Whisk the egg yolks until they are a nice pale yellow color.
Add 1 tablespoon of fresh lemon juice to the egg yolks and whisk in.
Add 1/4 teaspoon of salt, 1/8 of a teaspoon of cayenne pepper (or paprika), and 1/8 of a teaspoon of black pepper to the mixture and whisk in.
Drizzle the melted butter into the egg yolk mixture while continuously whisking until it thickens up.
Crack fresh eggs into small bowls for poaching.
Bring a large pot of water to a hard boil, then reduce to a gentle simmer.
Split English muffins with a fork to create nooks and crannies.
Heat a pan over medium-high heat and cook Canadian bacon for about 2 minutes per side.
Add 1/4 teaspoon of vinegar to the simmering water for poaching eggs.
Gently tip each egg into the center of the simmering water and cook for 3 to 5 minutes, depending on desired yolk doneness.
Pop split English muffins into the toaster until nice and crispy.
Assemble by placing two slices of Canadian bacon on an English muffin, topped with one poached egg, and a generous spoonful of Hollandaise sauce.
Garnish with fresh chives.

title: Pancakes with Berries
description: Fluffy pancakes topped with fresh berries and maple syrup
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, sift together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Whisk in milk, eggs, and melted butter just until combined. Fold in blueberries.
Preheat a flat griddle over medium-high heat.
Scoop 1/4 cup of pancake batter onto griddle. Let pancakes cook until bubbles form before flipping.
Cook other side until golden brown. Serve hot with syrup.

title: Breakfast Burrito
description: Hearty breakfast wrapped in a warm tortilla
ingredients: One jalapeno, diced (seeds in or out)
Half a finely diced sweet onion
Large handful of finely chopped cilantro
Juice and zest of one lime
One to two large russet potatoes, peeled and grated
instructions: Make your own flour burrito-sized tortillas (1:12-1:34)
For the scrambled eggs, start with a non-stick skillet over medium heat (1:58-2:05)
Add 3 tablespoons (42 grams) of unsalted butter to the hot skillet (2:01-2:07)
Whisk 8 eggs in a bowl until thoroughly combined, no salt yet (2:07-2:10)
Add eggs to the pan and immediately begin continuously stirring (2:13-2:17)
Cook until just cooked through and hold together on a spatula, but aren't complete rubber (2:25-2:28)
Season with salt and pepper to taste (2:30-2:31)
For the bacon, slice thick-cut bacon into lardons or leave whole (2:49-2:52)
Place bacon on a foil-lined baking sheet and toss into a cold oven that's completely off (2:54-2:57)
Set oven to 450°F (232°C) and cook for 20 to 25 minutes or until beautifully browned and lightly crisp (2:59-3:05)
Alternatively, cook bacon in a pan (3:05-3:06)

For the Pico de Gallo, in a small bowl, add one large ripe diced tomato, one diced jalapeno, half a finely diced sweet onion, a large handful of finely chopped cilantro, and the juice and zest of one lime (3:08-3:22)
Add a glug of olive oil and salt and pepper to taste (3:23-3:24)
Mix until thoroughly combined (3:26-3:28)
For the hash browns, peel and grate one to two large russet potatoes on a cheese grater (3:31-3:34)
Rinse under water and then wring out as much moisture as possible in a hand towel (3:35-3:39)
Heat a medium-sized skillet with enough oil to coat the bottom of the pan over medium heat (3:40-3:45)
Once hot, press in your potatoes and cook for about three to four minutes (3:45-3:48)
Flip and repeat on the other side until cooked through and crispy on both sides (3:48-3:52)
To assemble, lay down a decent layer of scrambled egg on a tortilla (3:58-4:02)
Add big old chunky bacon (around two slices per burrito) (4:02-4:07)
Add grated medium sharp cheddar (optionally melt with a kitchen torch) (4:07-4:12)
Top with Pico de Gallo (4:12-4:14)
Layer on hash browns to cover the entire thing (4:14-4:17)
Roll up the burrito by folding in the edges while rolling it up from the bottom until tightly wound (4:21-4:27)
Griddle in a dry non-stick pan over medium heat for about one to two minutes per side to heat and lightly toast the tortilla (4:30-4:37)

title: Smoothie Bowl
description: Thick smoothie topped with fresh fruits and granola
instructions: Combine all the ingredients starting with the liquids in your blender
blend until smooth
pour into a bowl
decorate with your favorite toppings

title: French Toast
description: Golden and crispy bread soaked in egg mixture
ingredients: 1 teaspoon or 3 grams of ground cinnamon
half a teaspoon or 3 grams of fine sea salt
1.5 tablespoons or 23 grams of light brown sugar
a pinch of fresh grated nutmeg
half a cup or 120 milliliters of heavy cream
3/4 cup or 180 milliliters of whole milk
8-10 slices of brioche or challah bread (3/4 inch thick)
optional: a pad of butter for serving
instructions: In a medium-sized bowl, add eggs, egg yolks, cinnamon, salt, brown sugar, and nutmeg.
Whisk until thoroughly combined.
Whisk in heavy cream and whole milk to create the custard.
Dunk bread slices in the custard and let them sit for a few seconds to soak.
In a large pan, heat over medium heat and grease with unsalted butter.
Once hot and bubbling, lay in two slices of soaked bread.
Cook for about 3 minutes or until a nice brown crust forms.
Optionally, add additional butter at this point.
Flip and repeat on the other side.
Transfer finished pieces to a plate and repeat with the remaining bread.
Serve with a pad of butter on top and maple syrup.
